title: remotely capture
extract: Remote deposit capture (RDC) is a system that allows a customer to scan checks remotely and transmit the check images to a bank for deposit, usually via an encrypted Internet connection. ... Banks typically offer RDC to business customers rather than to individuals.
extract_html: Remote deposit capture (RDC) is a system that allows a customer to scan checks remotely and transmit the check images to a bank for deposit, usually via an encrypted Internet connection. ... Banks typically offer RDC to business customers rather than to individuals.
